text: relationships: [["BIT-China", "collaborated with", "other iGEM teams"],["BIT-China","used recombinase system with","other iGEM teams"],["BIT-China","designed gene circuits using","Cre-LoxP and Flp-FRT"],["Cre","is a kind of Tyrosine recombinase from","P1 bacteriophage"],["Cre","catalyzes the recombination of the gene between","two specific DNA sign sites (LoxP site)"],["Cre","does not need ATP or other cofactor to achieve","its function"],["Flp","is another kind of recombinase found in","Saccharomyces cerevisiae"],["Flp","recognizes the FRT sign site"]].
relationships: [["Duke", "collaborated with", "William and Mary"],["Duke","collaborated with","University of Maryland"],["Duke","met up with","UNC's iGEM team"]]
